text:
e="preserve">Dmytro Dmytrovych Kremin (; August 21, 1953 – May 25, 2019) was an Ukrainian poet, journalist, translator and scholar. Kremin was The Taras Shevchenko National Literary Prize in 1999. He was known for his book of poems called "Pectoral". He was born in Irshava district of Transcarpathia (Zakarpattia region), Ukraine.
Kremin died on May 25, 2019 in Mykolaiv, Ukraine at the age of 65.
